thread.title: Two appear in KZN court for murder of 8 people
thread.title_full: Two appear in KZN court for murder of 8 people | News24

author: news24.com
title: Two appear in KZN court for murder of 8 people
text:
Durban â€“ Two men have appeared at the South Coast Magistrate's Court in KwaZulu-Natal for the alleged murder of eight people on Friday.
SE Mncwabe and TD Mncwabe were charged with eight counts of murder, one of attempted murder and one of arson, NPA spokesperson Natasha Kara said.
"Both men are currently in custody and have applied for legal aid. They will appear on 28 October."
Eight people, including two babies, were murdered on Tuesday morning.
